component.name: describeGlobal
component.description: Lists the available objects and their metadata for your organization’s data

component.name: describeSObject
component.description: Completely describes the individual metadata at all levels for the specified object

component.name: listResourcesByApiVersion
component.description: Lists available resources for the specified API version

component.name: sObjectBasicInfo
component.description: Describes the individual metadata for the specified object

component.name: sObjectRows
component.description: Accesses records based on the specified object ID

component.name: listAvailableApiVersion
component.description: List summary information about each REST API version currently available.

component.name: sObjectPlatformAction
component.description: PlatformAction is a virtual read-only object that enables you to query for actions—such as standard and custom buttons, quick actions, and productivity actions—that should be displayed in a UI, given a user, a context, device format, and a record ID.

component.name: sObjectRowsByExternalId
component.description: SObject Rows by External ID resource to retrieve records with a specific external ID

component.name: returnHeadersOfSObjectRowsByExternalId
component.description: Return headers that are returned by sending a GET request to the sObject Rows by External ID resource.

component.name: viewRelevantItems
component.description: Retrieves the current user’s most relevant items that include up to 50 of the most recently viewed or updated records for each object in the user’s global search scope.
